When, therefore, he found in his study of the Bible, various chronological periods that, according to his understanding of them, extended to the second coming of Christ, he could not but regard them as the \93times before appointed,\94 which God had revealed unto his servants. \93The secret things,\94 says Moses, \93belong unto the Lord our God; but 
324
those things which are revealed belong unto us and to our children forever,\94 [Deuteronomy 29:29.] and the Lord declares by the prophet Amos, that he \93will do nothing, but he revealeth his secret unto his servants the prophets.\94 [Amos 3:7.] The students of God's Word may then confidently expect to find the most stupendous event to take place in human history clearly pointed out in the Scriptures of truth.
